settings.label: t:settings_schema.typography.settings.type_header_font.label
settings.info: t:settings_schema.typography.settings.type_header_font.info

settings.label: Custom Font Link
settings.info: Advanced. If using a custom Adobe font, Adobe will give you a link like 'https://use.typekit.net/xxxxxxx.css to paste here. If using downloaded .woff or .woff2 files, upload those files as well as their corresponding .css file to your Shopify Files and paste the link for the css file here.

settings.label: Custom Font Family Name
settings.info: Advanced. If using a custom Adobe font, Adobe will specify the font name after 'font-family' within the web project. If using a downloaded .woff or .woff2 file, look in the css file after 'font-family' to find the font name.
